data.title: Microsoft’s Project Natick underwater datacenter experiment confirms viability of seafloor data storage
data.text: Microsoft has concluded a years-long experiment involving use of a shipping container-sized underwater data center, placed on the sea floor off the cost of Scotland’s Orkney Islands.
